# Stellar API 

## Postman collection

Although Stellar provides a good [API portal](https://www.stellar.org/laboratory/#?network=test) for users to test, there is no good Open API specification document exposed to public for developers. Here I created a Postman collection together with environments for hitting API endpoints. The collection should have included all the latest API endpoints shown in [Stellar REST API](https://www.stellar.org/developers/horizon/reference/).


[API spec](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/1066628/S1TVWHNi?version=latest)


[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/07cc53f7d54f01d9abe5#?env%5BStellar%20Testnet%)
